quotes.quote: You don't need fancy highbrow traditions or money to really learn. You just need people with the desire to better themselves.
quotes.author: Adam Cooper and Bill Collage

quotes.quote: It is possible to store the mind with a million facts and still be entirely uneducated.
quotes.author: Alec Bourne

quotes.quote: An education isn't how much you have committed to memory, or even how much you know. It's being able to differentiate between what you do know and what you don't.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: A well-informed mind is the best security against the contagion of folly and of vice. The vacant mind is ever on the watch for relief, and ready to plunge into error, to escape from the languor of idleness.
quotes.author: Ann Radcliffe

quotes.quote: Education is the best provision for old age.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Education is what survives when what has been learned has been forgotten.
quotes.author: B. F. Skinner

quotes.quote: The strength of the United States is not the gold at Fort Knox or the weapons of mass destruction that we have, but the sum total of the education and the character of our people.
quotes.author: Claiborne Pell

quotes.quote: Everyone has a right to a university degree in America, even if it's in Hamburger Technology.
quotes.author: Clive James

quotes.quote: School is learning things you don't want to know, surrounded by people you wish you didn't know, while working toward a future you don't know will ever come.
quotes.author: Dave Kellett

quotes.quote: The number of books will grow continually, and one can predict that a time will come when it will be almost as difficult to learn anything from books as from the direct study of the whole universe. It will be almost as convenient to search for some bit of truth concealed in nature as it will be to find it hidden away in an immense multitude of bound volumes.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: The foundation of every state is the education of its youth.
quotes.author: Diogenes Laertius

quotes.quote: Education begins a gentleman, conversation completes him.
quotes.author: Dr. Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: I didn't go to college at all, any college, and I'm not saying you wasted your time or money, but look at me, I'm a huge celebrity.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Only the educated are free.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: America believes in education: the average professor earns more money in a year than a professional athlete earns in a whole week.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Education... has produced a vast population able to read but unable to distinguish what is worth reading.
quotes.author: G. M. Trevelyan

quotes.quote: Good teaching is one-fourth preparation and three-fourths theater.
quotes.author: Gail Godwin

quotes.quote: A fool's brain digests philosophy into folly, science into superstition, and art into pedantry. Hence University education.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Human history becomes more and more a race between education and catastrophe.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: College isn't the place to go for ideas.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Education has for its object the formation of character.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: Next in importance to freedom and justice is popular education, without which neither freedom nor justice can be permanently maintained.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: Bachelor's degrees make pretty good placemats if you get 'em laminated.
quotes.author: Jeph Jacques

quotes.quote: That's what college is for - getting as many bad decisions as possible out of the way before you're forced into the real world. I keep a checklist of 'em on the wall in my room.
quotes.author: Jeph Jacques

quotes.quote: A university is what a college becomes when the faculty loses interest in students.
quotes.author: John Ciardi

quotes.quote: She knows what is the best purpose of education: not to be frightened by the best but to treat it as part of daily life.
quotes.author: John Mason Brown

quotes.quote: Fathers send their sons to college either because they went to college or because they didn't.
quotes.author: L. L. Henderson

quotes.quote: Education is a method whereby one acquires a higher grade of prejudices.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter
